2.desc: Enter the version you want to compare it against into the 'Modified Text' field on the right.

3.desc: Press the 'Compare Files' button to start the analysis process.

4.title: Review Differences
4.desc: See the results below. Green lines are added, red lines are removed, and gray lines are unchanged.

faq.a1: Absolutely. This tool runs entirely client-side using JavaScript. No data is ever transmitted to our servers or stored anywhere.
faq.a2: You can compare any plain text content, including source code (PHP, JS, Python), configuration files, and standard text documents.
faq.q3: Can it compare Word or PDF files?
faq.a3: Currently, you need to copy the text from those files and paste it here. We are working on direct file upload support.
faq.a4: The current version focuses on additions and deletions. Moved lines will show as a deletion in one place and an addition in another.
faq.a5: The only limit is your browser's memory. Most standard documents and code files will compare almost instantly.
